alert.note: Alert for Central Ventura County Valleys; Santa Cruz and Anacapa Islands; Santa Monica Mountains; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 24 at 8:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Ventura County through 900 PM PST... At 759 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from near Ventura Harbor to near Anacapa Island. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oxnard... Ventura... Camarillo... Port Hueneme... Ventura Harbor... Naval Base Ventura County... Silver Strand Beach... LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
